channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiMail
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiMail

item.title: CVE-2023-45582|2024-08-30T18:14:28.885Z -- fortinet -- fortimail
item.description: An improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts vulnerability [CWE-307] in FortiMail webmail version 7.2.0 through 7.2.4, 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 and before 6.4.8 may allow an unauthenticated attacker toÂ perform a brute force attack on the affected endpoints via repeated login attempts.

item.title: CVE-2023-36633|2024-08-30T18:10:16.620Z -- fortinet -- fortimail
item.description: An improper authorization vulnerability [CWE-285] in FortiMail webmail version 7.2.0 through 7.2.2 and before 7.0.5 allows an authenticated attacker to see and modify the title of address book folders of other users via crafted HTTP or HTTPs requests.
